mapper.sql: dm.domain_id, dm.domain_name, dm.platform_id, dm.create_time, dm.update_time, dm.`status`, dm.`comment`, dm.type, dm.occurs, dm.max_occurs, dm.tags
mapper.insert: insert into domain(domain_id, domain_name, platform_id, create_time, update_time, `status`, `comment`, type, occurs, max_occurs, tags) values (#{domainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domainName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platformId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{occurs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxOccurs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update domain set domain_name = #{domainName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, occurs = #{occurs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, max_occurs = #{maxOccurs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tags = #{tags,jdbcType=INTEGER} where domain_id = #{domainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
